title: BabyBandit
author: BabyBandit
created_time: October 06, 2023, 04:04:23 PMLast edit: October 06, 2023, 05:29:45 PM by BabyBandit
content: Sup! As the topic says, where can I exchange my Skrill balance (USD) to BTC at the best rate? I know about all the P2P websites. But many of them got quite high precent on their offers, so I trying to ask here if anyone know a better way to make the exchange?Or if someone here want to trade their BTC for Skrill balance (USD)? Maybe it's not possible to find a better way then using the P2P deal's but never hurt to ask.  If anyone know anything or have any idea feel free to share them with me if you want. Thanks!

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: BabyBandit on October 06, 2023, 04:04:23 PMSup! As the topic says, where can I exchange my Skrill balance (USD) to BTC at the best rate? I know about all the P2P websites. But many of them got quite high precent on their offers, so I trying to ask here if anyone know a better way to make the exchange?It looks like that's the way to go for skrill. I just checked Bestchange (https://www.bestchange.com/skrill-to-bitcoin.html) where I expected to get the best rates, but there are only 3 exchanges accepting skrill USD for bitcoin and for the best rate there, you have to buy Bitcoin at over 8% of the current market priceSeems too high for my liking

comments.author: CCMS
comments.body: Isn't Skrill a reversible FIAT system ?

comments.author: BabyBandit
comments.created_time: October 07, 2023, 09:16:18 AMLast edit: October 08, 2023, 03:24:19 PM by BabyBandit
comments.body: Quote from: JeromeTash on October 06, 2023, 09:28:32 PMQuote from: BabyBandit on October 06, 2023, 04:04:23 PMSup! As the topic says, where can I exchange my Skrill balance (USD) to BTC at the best rate? I know about all the P2P websites. But many of them got quite high precent on their offers, so I trying to ask here if anyone know a better way to make the exchange?It looks like that's the way to go for skrill. I just checked Bestchange (https://www.bestchange.com/skrill-to-bitcoin.html) where I expected to get the best rates, but there are only 3 exchanges accepting skrill USD for bitcoin and for the best rate there, you have to buy Bitcoin at over 8% of the current market priceSeems too high for my likingThanks for checking up for me.   Appreciate it!Quote from: CCMS on October 07, 2023, 06:30:42 AMIsn't Skrill a reversible FIAT system ?I been using Skrill for almost 10 years and never had that problem, on this forum everything is reversible  , but fact is that the most things is not.Skrill is not reversible as PayPal for example. This is if you use Skrill to Skrill then it's not reversible.

comments.author: Betfair23
comments.body: You can use P2P in binance I used it before and was good rates
